CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 放；放置；安置；设置；使…陷入；使处于（某状态或某情况）；使与…连接；给予；归因于；推卸给；施加于；投掷；推动；记录；表达；提出（问题、建议）；安装；执行（动作）；参与；使参与；把…视为；把…列为；（在…上）书写；记；做标记；使…前往；将…送往
投掷；（高尔夫）推杆；（体育运动中的）投掷动作；（尤指股票交易中的）卖出期权

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 投掷；（高尔夫球）打球入洞
放置（put的ing形式）；轻击球；使球入洞的轻击（putt的ing形式）
推棒；置放者；新进的矿工
闲荡；行为懒散（过去式puttered，过去分词puttered，现在分词puttering，第三人称单数putters，名词putterer）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，含义较广泛。指把人或物置于某处，并将其留在该处。
普通用词，指为了某种目的而将人或物放在一定位置上。指物是多指立着放。
指小心地把人或物平放或横放，侧重动作安稳。
较正式用词，指把某物放在一个正确的位置上，侧重动作的正确。

word_group.brief_definition: 付诸实践；投入实践；付诸
张贴；建造；表现出, 显示出；宿夜, 过夜, 住宿
将...放在一起；装配；组建；拟定；设计制造
把…放在一边；忽视；不理睬；储存备用
放回原处；推迟；拨慢(钟表指针)
在...方面花费精力；把精力投入到...

bilingual.source: She does not put sugar in tea.
You put the paper in there first!

bilingual.target: 把它们放进你的书包里。

bilingual.source: She put the hen in the basket.
He put the keys in his pocket.
Oops, where did I put the pictures?

list.abstract: put（英[pʊt]，美[pʊt]），英语单词。作动词时，释义为放；置；使处于某一状态。作名词时，释义为投掷；推。短语搭配为put up with（忍受）。例句为“He put his arms around his little girl, and he begged for her forgiveness.（他搂着他的小女孩，恳求她的原谅）。” put的现在分词为putting，过去分词为put。其不及物动词近义词有leave、set out。

yingyinNormal.en: Put me down! Let me go!
yingyinNormal.zh: 放我下来！放我走！

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I didn't put it in. Then who did?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是。噢，也不是我放的。是谁放的？

yingyinNormal.en: Just put them in the drawer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 放抽屉里吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's put the spaghetti in the trolley.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把她们放进推车里吧。

yingyinNormal.en: There's chicken in there. Put it away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 里面有鸡肉，拿去放好。

yingyinNormal.en: Tell them to put the sugar in the teacup.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让它们把糖放进茶杯中。

yingyinNormal.en: What is this? Who put a twenty down here?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么？谁放了20元？

yingyinNormal.en: Your the girl whose head she put back on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是你的头被她放回去了。

yingyinNormal.en: Now remember your card, put it back in the deck.
yingyinNormal.zh: 记住这张牌，再把它放回去。

yingyinNormal.en: You put moths in my food?! For science.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在我食物里放虫子？！为了科学而献身。

yingyinNormal.en: First, I put some flour in the bowl. Ooooo!
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，我把一些面粉放进碗里。噢！！！

yingyinNormal.en: Somebody help grab that thing. Everybody put in...
yingyinNormal.zh: 快来人帮忙抓住那个东西，大家都放...

yingyinNormal.en: These two Arabidopsis plants are being put inside a chamber.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这两株阿拉伯芥将被放进一个密闭的箱体。

yingyinNormal.en: Farkle's right! This is a serious assignment. Put Farkle down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 弗科说得对！这是个严肃的任务，赶紧把弗科放下来！

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, who put that tree there?
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，谁把那棵树放在那儿？

yingyinNormal.en: Just put your feet up. Relax.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把腿抬起来。放松。

yingyinNormal.en: Put them over there in the sink.
yingyinNormal.zh: 放到水池那边。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, you put me in this position.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，你把我放到这个位置上

yingyinNormal.en: Put your head down. It's okay. Relax.
yingyinNormal.zh: 躺好，就这样，放松点。

yingyinNormal.en: Here you go. Thank you Gunther, put it there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来了。谢谢，甘瑟，放在这里。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (put on)穿上; (行为举止) 假装
(put in place)出台; 实施; 准备就绪
(put a premium on)重视; 奖励

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: vt. 放；表达；（put的现在分词）
n. 产量；输出端；输出；生产；产生；输出功率；生产过程

word_family.mean: v. 放；置；使处于某一状态；把… 归咎于；把… 推诿给；把…施加于；投掷；推；写上；印上

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 付诸实践；投入实践；付诸
穿上；增加；举办；打开；(行为举止)假装；矫饰
放在一起；放到一起；放一起
落实到位；到位；正在实施

sense_info_list.en: place in or move into a particular position

examination_example.sentence: On the other hand, <highlight>putting</highlight> your faith in the wrong place often carries a high price.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，把你的信念放在错误的地方往往会带来高昂的代价。

examination_example.sentence: The issue is not the need for more houses but, as always, where to <highlight>put</highlight> them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像以往一样，问题不是需要更多的住房，该如何安置这些住房。

examination_example.sentence: It needs to <highlight>put</highlight> historical prejudices to one side and take some steps to address our urgent housing need.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它需要把历史偏见放在一边，采取一些措施来解决我们迫切的住房需求。

sense_info_list.en: cause someone or something to be in the stated condition or situation

examination_example.sentence: Scientists have found that exposure to this hormone <highlight>puts</highlight> us in a trusting mood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家发现，接触这种激素会让我们产生信任的情绪。

examination_example.sentence: We rose-tint our memories and <highlight>put</highlight> ourselves into self-affirming situations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们美化了自己的记忆，把自己置于自我肯定的情境中。

examination_example.sentence: Gray and his colleagues have <highlight>put</highlight> them to the test by examining four family trees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 格雷和他的同事通过研究四个家族树来测试它们。

sense_info_list.zh: (put on)穿上; (行为举止) 假装

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Put</highlight> on a good face, always.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 永远要装出一副好面孔。

examination_example.sentence: Do the best you can to gather all of the enthusiasm and energy you can, <highlight>put</highlight> on a big smile and say "Hi".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽你所能调动你所有的热情和能量，露出一个大大的笑容并说“嗨”。

examination_example.sentence: A mother is asked to interact with her child in a normal way before <highlight>putting</highlight> on a blank expression.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位母亲被要求以正常的方式与她的孩子互动，然后面无表情。

examination_example.sentence: James Herriot did not find it easy in his early days of, as he <highlight>put</highlight> it,"having a go at the writing game".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 詹姆斯·赫里奥特说，他早年“尝试写作”时并不容易。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>put</highlight> it another way: How can we make sure that the thinking of intelligent machines reflects humanity's highest values?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说：我们如何确保智能机器的思维反映了人类的最高价值观？

examination_example.sentence: As Moritz <highlight>puts</highlight> it, how often are federal dollars building homes that are likely to be lost to a wildfire?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如莫里茨所说，联邦政府在建造房屋时花费的资金有多少可能会因野火而损失？

sense_info_list.en: bring into operation; to cause to be used

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>put</highlight> too much burden on individual motorists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们给个人司机增加了太多负担。

examination_example.sentence: Corporations are evading the meritocratic hiring and promotion of women to top positions — no matter how much "soft pressure" is <highlight>put</highlight> upon them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 企业正在逃避精英招聘和提拔女性担任高层职位——不管有多少“软压力”施加在它们身上。

examination_example.sentence: The norms of culture in Western civil services suit those who want to stay <highlight>put</highlight> but is bad for high achievers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 西方行政部门的文化标准适合那些碌碌无为的人，但对于优秀人士是不利的。

examination_example.sentence: The homework rules should be <highlight>put</highlight> on hold while the school board looks into the matter and conducts public hearings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在学校董事会调查此事并举行公开听证会期间，家庭作业规定应该暂时搁置。

examination_example.sentence: The question "what happens when the wind doesn't blow or the sun doesn't shine?" has provided a quick <highlight>put</highlight>-down for skeptics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “当风不吹或太阳不亮时，会发生什么?”这个问题给了怀疑论者一个飞快的奚落。

sense_info_list.zh: (put in place)出台; 实施; 准备就绪

examination_example.sentence: The digital services tax is a much larger trend, with countries <highlight>putting</highlight> in place an alphabet soup of new international tax provisions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数字服务税是一个大得多的趋势，一些国家出台了一系列新的国际税收规定。

sense_info_list.zh: (put a premium on)重视; 奖励

examination_example.sentence: To combat the trap of <highlight>putting</highlight> a premium on being busy, Cal Newport recommends building a habit of "deep work".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卡尔·纽波特建议，要克服“忙碌”的陷阱，养成“深度工作”的习惯。

examination_example.sentence: The bargain is very pure: Employee <highlight>puts</highlight> in hours of physical or mental labor and employee draws out life-sustaining moola.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 员工投入数小时的体力或脑力劳动，员工提取维持生活的工资。

sense_info_list.en: to give or attach a particular level of importance, trust, value, etc. to sth

examination_example.sentence: Education in the age of automation should <highlight>put</highlight> more emphasis on a creative potential.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自动化时代的教育应该更加重视创造潜力。

sense_info_list.en: judge something or someone in comparison with other similar things or people
to cause sb/sth to go to a particular place

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 张贴；建造；表现出；显示出；宿夜；过夜；住宿

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 产量；输出端；输出；生产；产生；输出功率；生产过程

word_family.mean: v. 放；置；使处于某一状态；把… 归咎于；把… 推诿给；把…施加于；投掷；推；写上；印上

sense_info_list.en: place in or move into a particular position

examination_example.sentence: I hope everyone <highlight>puts</highlight> their studies, work and life before chasing stars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我希望每个人都把学习，工作，生活放在追星的前面。

examination_example.sentence: For example, Hunt's <highlight>put</highlight> a "non-GMO" label on its canned crushed tomatoes a few years ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，几年前，Hunt's在其罐装碎番茄上贴上了“非转基因”标签。

examination_example.sentence: You can <highlight>put</highlight> them in scanning rigs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以把它们放在扫描设备里。

sense_info_list.en: cause someone or something to be in the stated condition or situation

examination_example.sentence: It may <highlight>put</highlight> some students in remote areas at a disadvantage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能会使一些边远地区的学生处于不利地位。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers at the Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation in America, <highlight>put</highlight> the death toll in 2017 at 1.24 million.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国卫生指标和评估研究所的研究人员估计，2017年的死亡人数为124万。

examination_example.sentence: As it becomes easier to digitally recreate celebrities and to entirely manufacture on-screen identities, could this technology <highlight>put</highlight> actors out of jobs?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着数字化再造名人和完全在屏幕上制造身份变得越来越容易，这种技术会让演员失业吗？

examination_example.sentence: This is because the more technology is <highlight>put</highlight> into the field, the more people are needed to deploy, maintain and improve it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是因为投入到该领域的技术越多，就需要越多的人来部署、维护和改进它。

examination_example.sentence: Only some can be <highlight>put</highlight> to use under current traffic conditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在目前的交通条件下，只有部分（车辆）能够投入使用。

sense_info_list.en: bring into operation; to cause to be used
give expression to

examination_example.sentence: Genetic selection is a way of exerting influence over others, "the ultimate collective control of human destinies," as writer H. G. Wells <highlight>put</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基因选择是对他人施加影响的一种方式，正如作家H. G. Wells所说，“人类命运的最终集体控制”。

examination_example.sentence: Why do you <highlight>put</highlight> up with such adverse conditions?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你为什么能忍受如此不利的条件？

examination_example.sentence: The waste has been <highlight>put</highlight> down to burning old cosmetic stock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种浪费被归因于燃烧旧的化妆品原料。

word_usage.usage:
put不能表示持续性的状态，通常不能用于完成体，也不能与表示一段时间的状语连用。
示例：我让那本书在架子上放了一个小时。
误 I have put the book on the shelf for an hour.
正 I have kept the book on the shelf for an hour.
put的过去式和过去分词都是put。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 产量；输出端；输出；生产；产生；输出功率；生产过程

word_family.mean: v. 放；置；使处于某一状态；把… 归咎于；把… 推诿给；把…施加于；投掷；推；写上；印上

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 张贴；建造；表现出；显示出；宿夜；过夜；住宿

sense_info_list.en: place in or move into a particular position

examination_example.sentence: Many children like to <highlight>put</highlight> foreign objects in their mouths.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多孩子喜欢把异物放进嘴里。

examination_example.sentence: The intention to <highlight>put</highlight> a home-cooked meal on the table was pretty much universal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把一顿家常菜摆上餐桌的想法是相当普遍的。

examination_example.sentence: If a robot does chores around the house, you wouldn't want it to <highlight>put</highlight> the pet cat in the oven.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果一个机器人在家里做家务，你不会希望它把宠物猫放进烤箱。

sense_info_list.en: cause someone or something to be in the stated condition or situation

examination_example.sentence: Should the cars be programmed to avoid hitting a child running across the road, even if that will <highlight>put</highlight> their passengers at risk?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是否应该对汽车进行编程，以避免撞到横穿马路的儿童，即使那样做会使乘客处于危险之中？

examination_example.sentence: No matter how it happened, millions of Americans are <highlight>putting</highlight> their health, quality of life and even length of life in danger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论它是如何发生的，数以百万计的美国人正将他们的健康、生活质量甚至寿命置于危险之中。

examination_example.sentence: What government has not yet found is the political will to <highlight>put</highlight> that understanding into full practice with a sequence of smart schooling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政府还没有找到通过一系列智能教育把这种理解完全付诸实践的政治意愿。

examination_example.sentence: I managed to sell a lot of my old furniture and <highlight>put</highlight> that extra money towards the new material.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我设法卖掉了许多旧家具，把多余的钱用在新材料上。

examination_example.sentence: The agents' questions compel student tutors to think and explain the materials in different ways, and watching the agent solve problems allows them to see their knowledge <highlight>put</highlight> into action.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “虚拟学生“提出的问题促使小老师们换以不同的方式思考和解释问题，而看“学生们”如何解决问题可以让他们目睹自己的知识付诸于实施。

examination_example.sentence: The code to access the program cost $ 120— a big sum for Harper, who had already <highlight>put</highlight> down $ 450 for textbooks, and had rent day approaching.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 访问该程序的代码需要花费120美元，这对哈珀来说是一大笔钱，她已经花了450美元买了教科书，而且房租日也快到了。

sense_info_list.en: bring into operation; to cause to be used

examination_example.sentence: As demand for food rises faster than supplies are growing, the resulting food-price inflation <highlight>puts</highlight> severe stress on the governments of many countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于食品需求的增长速度快于供应的增长速度，由此导致的食品价格上涨给许多国家的政府带来了严重的压力。

examination_example.sentence: Every day after school, Joe's dad drives him to the restaurant so he can <highlight>put</highlight> his ideas straight on the wall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天放学后，乔的爸爸开车送他去餐馆，这样他就可以把他的想法直接画在墙上。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Put</highlight> all his complaints in writing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把他所有的抱怨都写下来。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Put</highlight> calorie information on the menu.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在菜单上注明卡路里。

sense_info_list.en: to express or state something in a particular way

examination_example.sentence: Another, funded by Quaker Oats, concluded, as a Daily Mail story <highlight>put</highlight> it, that "hot oatmeal (燕麦粥) breakfast keeps you full for longer."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个由Quaker Oats资助的项目得出结论，正如《每日邮报》的一篇报道所说，“热燕麦粥早餐能让你更长时间保持饱腹感。”

examination_example.sentence: Simply <highlight>put</highlight>, countries stick to darker and more conservative colors because they appear more official.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简单地说，国家坚持使用更暗、更保守的颜色，因为它们看起来更正式。

examination_example.sentence: Well, <highlight>put</highlight> simply, these are not the chairs my wife and I selected in your store last week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 呃，简而言之，这些不是我和我妻子上周在你们店里挑选的椅子。

sense_info_list.en: judge something or someone in comparison with other similar things or people

examination_example.sentence: The man parked but didn't <highlight>put</highlight> on the handbrake of his car properly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这名男子停好车了，但没有把手刹拉好。

word_usage.usage:
put不能表示持续性的状态，通常不能用于完成体，也不能与表示一段时间的状语连用。
示例：我让那本书在架子上放了一个小时。
误 I have put the book on the shelf for an hour.
正 I have kept the book on the shelf for an hour.
put的过去式和过去分词都是put。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 付诸实践；投入实践；付诸
举起；修建；张贴；提高(价格等)；留宿
穿上；戴上；演出；上演；增加(体重)
将...放在一起；装配；组建；拟定；设计制造
写下；记下；放下；付(订金)；镇压
推迟；延期；(车船等停住)让(某人)下车
把…放在一边；忽视；不理睬；储存备用
放回原处；推迟；拨慢(钟表指针)
安装；花费(时间或精力)做；提出

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 产量；输出端；输出；生产；产生；输出功率；生产过程

word_family.mean: v. 放；置；使处于某一状态；把… 归咎于；把… 推诿给；把…施加于；投掷；推；写上；印上

sense_info_list.en: cause someone or something to be in the stated condition or situation

examination_example.sentence: A row of reflective boards on a nearby mountainside were <highlight>put</highlight> to use.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 附近山坡上的一排反光板投入使用。

examination_example.sentence: The Good Morning Britain presenter says she's been able to <highlight>put</highlight> a lot of what she's learnt into practice in her own home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位《早安英国》的主持人说，她已经能够在自己家里把自己所学到的很多东西付诸实践。

examination_example.sentence: Just to kind of <highlight>put</highlight> it back in the mind that Waller is dance music as much as it is concert music.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只是为了让人们想起华勒的曲子既是音乐会上演奏的音乐，也是舞蹈音乐。

sense_info_list.en: place in or move into a particular position

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Put</highlight> different types of clothing on different surfaces in the room.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把不同类型的衣服放在房间的不同台面上。

examination_example.sentence: Jenna threw the burnt piece into the sink and <highlight>put</highlight> in the other slice of bread.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Jenna把烧焦的面包片扔进水槽，然后放进另一片面包。

examination_example.sentence: Be sure to <highlight>put</highlight> the waste in the correct containers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请务必将垃圾放入正确的容器中。

sense_info_list.en: bring into operation; to cause to be used

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Put</highlight> pressure on schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对学校施加压力。

examination_example.sentence: Lots of people find it hard to get up in the morning and <highlight>put</highlight> the blame on the alarm clock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多人发现早上很难起床，并将责任归咎于闹钟。

examination_example.sentence: After he was <highlight>put</highlight> on disability for a bad back, he bought a small farm in the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他背部受伤致残后，他在乡下买了一个小农场。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Put</highlight> into words why you feel unworthy, why you don't feel good enough.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用语言表达为什么你觉得自己不值得，为什么你感觉不够好。

examination_example.sentence: In 1960 a mathematician <highlight>put</highlight> it this way: "If we use a mechanical agency with whose operation we cannot effectively interfere (干预)."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1960年，一位数学家这样说：“如果我们使用一个机械机构，我们就不能有效地干预它的运作。”

examination_example.sentence: As some psychologists <highlight>put</highlight> it, "It is not that children are little scientists but that scientists are big children."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如一些心理学家所说，“不是孩子们是小科学家，而是科学家们是大孩子。”

sense_info_list.en: to write something

examination_example.sentence: Okay, I'll <highlight>put</highlight> it on my list.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好吧，我把它写在清单上。

examination_example.sentence: It is enough to <highlight>put</highlight> the page number and one or two words as a reminder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 写上页码和一两个单词作为提醒就足够了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使处于某种状态或情况

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: vt. 放；表达；（put的现在分词）
n. 产量；输出端；输出；生产；产生；输出功率；生产过程

word_family.mean: v. 放；置；使处于某一状态；把… 归咎于；把… 推诿给；把…施加于；投掷；推；写上；印上

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 张贴；建造；表现出；显示出；宿夜；过夜；住宿
在...方面花费精力；把精力投入到...
描述出；解释清楚；使被人理解
为某人接通电话；使某人经历

sense_info_list.en: place in or move into a particular position

examination_example.sentence: So it's important to <highlight>put</highlight> them in the right recycling bins.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，将它们放入正确的回收箱是非常重要的。

examination_example.sentence: She <highlight>put</highlight> her big brown shopping bag down onto the floor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她把她的大棕色购物袋放在地板上。

examination_example.sentence: You are supposed to <highlight>put</highlight> it on the table!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该把它放在桌子上！

examination_example.sentence: It's understandable to <highlight>put</highlight> it off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 推迟是可以理解的。

examination_example.sentence: The 2020 Tokyo Olympic Games have been <highlight>put</highlight> off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2020 年东京奥运会已被推迟。

examination_example.sentence: Never <highlight>put</highlight> off till tomorrow what you can do today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 永远不要把今天能做的事推迟到明天。

examination_example.sentence: Why did Ryan want to <highlight>put</highlight> up a sign?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 瑞安为什么要挂个牌子？

examination_example.sentence: Disney even <highlight>put</highlight> up their "10 new rules for being a modern princess".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 迪士尼甚至提出了“成为现代公主的 10 条新规则”。

sense_info_list.en: cause someone or something to be in the stated condition or situation
sense_info_list.zh: 使处于某种状态或情况

examination_example.sentence: Have you ever thought about how these things can actually be <highlight>put</highlight> to good use?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你有没有想过如何才能真正地利用好这些东西？

examination_example.sentence: It's necessary to <highlight>put</highlight> ourselves in parents' shoes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们有必要设身处地为父母着想。

examination_example.sentence: The next step is to look for careers that <highlight>put</highlight> those interests to use.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下一步是寻找能够利用这些兴趣的职业。

examination_example.sentence: So whenever you go out, don't forget to <highlight>put</highlight> on your mask.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以你无论何时出门，别忘了戴上口罩。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Put</highlight> on your coat, or you will catch a cold!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 穿上你的外套，否则你会感冒的！

examination_example.sentence: Just let me <highlight>put</highlight> on my shoes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就让我穿上鞋子吧。

examination_example.sentence: In our life, it is not how much you do, but how much love you <highlight>put</highlight> into what you do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们的生活中，重要的不是你做了多少，而是你对你所做的事情投入了多少爱。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Putting</highlight> the effort in the right place is more important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把努力放在正确的地方更重要。

examination_example.sentence: You need to spend much time and <highlight>put</highlight> all your efforts to it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你需要花费大量的时间并全力​​以赴。

examination_example.sentence: Ms. Lauren has asked the students to <highlight>put</highlight> down notes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 劳伦女士让学生们做笔记。

sense_info_list.en: to give or attach a particular level of importance, trust, value, etc. to something

examination_example.sentence: In the American culture, people <highlight>put</highlight> a higher value on work than on sleep．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国文化中，人们对工作的重视高于对睡眠的重视。

examination_example.sentence: Teachers always <highlight>put</highlight> the needs of students above anything else.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老师总是把学生的需求放在首位。

examination_example.sentence: Please hold on and I'll <highlight>put</highlight> you through.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请稍等，我给你接通电话。

examination_example.sentence: You will <highlight>put</highlight> the caller through to them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你会将来电者转接给他们。

examination_example.sentence: If you are being bullied, don't <highlight>put</highlight> up with it – tell someone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你被欺负，不要忍着——告诉别人。

examination_example.sentence: They help <highlight>put</highlight> out the fire completely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们帮忙彻底扑灭了大火。

examination_example.sentence: Aim to smell clean and avoid <highlight>putting</highlight> on a lot of scented products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目标是闻起来干净，避免涂抹很多有香味的产品。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Putting</highlight> what I saw together, I was sure she was blind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 综合我所看到的所有情况，我确信她是盲人。

sense_info_list.en: bring into operation; to cause to be used

examination_example.sentence: It was a lot of pressure (压力) I <highlight>put</highlight> on myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我给自己施加了很大的压力。

examination_example.sentence: Teahouse was first <highlight>put</highlight> on in 1958.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《茶馆》于1958年首次上演。

word_usage.usage:
put不能表示持续性的状态，通常不能用于完成体，也不能与表示一段时间的状语连用。
示例：我让那本书在架子上放了一个小时。
误 I have put the book on the shelf for an hour.
正 I have kept the book on the shelf for an hour.
put的过去式和过去分词都是put。
